doc.title: Don Juan heiratet
doc.plot: A count has decided to marry. When his former lovers hear of this, they decide to kidnap him from the office of the Justice of Peace and bring him to a manson. He is able to escape and returns to his bride's house. Meanwhile a bum has told her where he is and she is off to the mansion. When the groom doesn't get a response to his shoutings, he tries to enter the house through the window, but is arrested, the same happens to the bride and the bum, when they try to enter.
